summary: The class generates a series of visualizations for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) analyses, creating stacked bar charts that display the distribution of individuals across lung‑function categories and further segmenting the data by sex, age group, and smoking severity, as well as illustrating mortality patterns by lung function and comparing modal deaths with Global Burden of Disease (GBD) estimates.
business_intent: Enable health analysts and policymakers to quickly assess COPD burden and mortality trends across demographic groups, supporting evidence‑based decision‑making for resource allocation, prevention strategies, and treatment planning.
